# Episodes

1. Output formats

1. Typed tables

1. EDA tables

1. Table one

1. Table two

# In this session, you will:

1. Knit the same document to different built-in output formats (Word and PDF) using the knit button.

1. Knit the same document to different built-in output formats (Word and PDF) using the YAML to store output options.

1. Knit the same document to a different output format from an extension package (`distill::distill_article`) by changing the YAML.

1. Make a markdown table.

1. Make a table one.

# Output formats used 

+ HTML
+ Word
+ PDF
+ `distill::distill_article`

# Relevant resources

+ [R4DS R Markdown formats](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/r-markdown-formats.html)
+ [R Markdown: The Definitive Guide on output formats](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/output-formats.html)
